subject: Re: [junit] Doubt in Httpservletrequest and Httpservletresponse
msgSnippet: Try using the httpunit package, they have a servletunit package for just testing Servlets. Ive used it and it works great. http://httpunit.sf.net //Erik ...
messageBody:
Try using the httpunit package, they have a servletunit package for
just testing Servlets. Ive used it and it works great.

http://httpunit.sf.net

//Erik
----- Original Message -----
From: "Satinder Singh" <satinderynr@...>
To: <junit@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, May 28, 2003 7:21 AM
Subject: [junit] Doubt in Httpservletrequest and Httpservletresponse


> Hi Everybody,
> As I am new to Junit I have created some small examples to test on junit but now when I am trying to test a method of servlet
having a parameters like HttpServletRequest and HttpServletResponse here I am stuck.
> Would anyone please tell me how to test a method with this type of complex parameters.
> Thanx
> Satinder.
